{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15142v1", "title": "Uniformly resolvable decompositions of $K_v$ into one $1$-factor and
  $n$-stars when $n>1$ is odd", "summary": "We consider uniformly resolvable decompositions of $K_v$ into subgraphs such
that each resolution class contains only blocks isomorphic to the same graph.
We give a complete solution for the case in which one resolution class is $K_2$
and the rest are $K_{1,n}$ where $n>1$ is odd.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO,math.GR", "published": "2025-04-21T14:45:39Z"}
